data.title: Request a Transcript
data.meta_description: Connect with the Registrar's Office for information on requesting print or electronic copies of your transcripts yourself or how to have a third party request a copy of your records on your behalf.
data.text:
Current students and alumni can order official transcripts online through R’Web. You will need your UCR NetID and password to login and place your order. Both electronic and paper transcripts are available.

If you need an attachment to be sent with your transcript, you will have the opportunity to upload a file when placing your order.

Need a UCR NetID or forgot your NetID/password? When you go to R’Web, select "Password Reset." Answer the security questions and you will be provided with your NetID and password. If you need additional assistance with your NetID or password, contact the Registrar’s Office at (951) 827-7284. If you need assistance with Multifactor Authentication, please contact BearHelp.

Choice of Name: When ordering an official transcript, you will be able to choose to have either your lived name or legal name appear on the document.

IMPORTANT: Electronic transcripts include a personalized notification to your recipient that includes your name as stored in your Parchment profile regardless of the name type you select on your transcript order. This profile was created the first time you accessed the transcript system and does not automatically update when you change your name in other UCR systems. To update your Parchment profile, please follow these instructions.
